page.title: 10MR BREWER 2
page.content: Mr Brewer sometimes watches the news and a few favourite programmes on television.Sometimes he goes to the Farmers Arms in St Columb Minor for an evening out with his son.Sometimes he goes on outings over the weekend with his son.Every year he goes to the Newquay carnival.He doesn't belong to any pensioner's clubs.He goes to bed at 9.00 because his son gets up early for his job as a lorry driver.He is very active for his age. Jack Marshall has done the milk round for the last 21 years.He covers Mawgan Porth,Trenance,Trevarian,St Eval and St Mawgan.He sells eggs,butter,drinks, fruit juices,cream and yoghurts.The milk costs 23p a pint.He thinks that it is fair other shops selling milk, as he supplies them.About 95% of people have a regular milk order.In the peak of the summer the amount of
